steps: Master the basics of Emirati pronunciation including how ق is pronounced as 'g' and ج as 'y/ch'
Practice clear pronunciation through focused audio drills
Record yourself saying essential greetings and responses
Build confidence through short speaking challenges with common phrases
Refine gendered language and polite expressions
Listen and respond to culturally specific Emirati phrases
Engage with everyday phrases and expressions used in real-life situations
Develop comfort with informal and semi-formal conversational structures
Understand and apply Emirati expressions in professional and social settings
Translate and rephrase complex sentences between Emirati and MSA
Record and analyze your own speech for fluency and accuracy
Participate in longer dialogues involving comparisons, intentions, and formal requests
